EmailTemplate.name: 2011_IMC_Aug16_ROI-Webinar_Email3
EmailTemplate.subject: LAST CHANCE TO REGISTER - Complimentary Live Webinar - August 16: Getting the Budget You Need By Proving Value and Return on Investment
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
LAST CHANCE TO REGISTER! Complimentary Live Webinar Getting the Budget You Need By Proving Value and Return on Investment (ROI)
Join representatives from TriTech Software Systems' Imc Solutions, Dell and the Maumelle and Gahanna Police Departments in a complimentary Live Webinar with Guest Speakers:
Lt. Mike Wilson with Maumelle (AR) Police Department Lt. Jeff Spence with Gahanna (OH) Division of Police Rodney Robles with Dell Rugged Computer Solutions John Kitsmiller with TriTech Software Systems
In this upcoming webinar, learn how to get the budget you need for time-saving and efficiency-building technology by proving the value and return on the investment for your agency.
We will discuss:
*Why ROI and Value Are Important *Measuring ROI for RMS, CAD and Mobile *Proving ROI and Value to Your Budget Authority *Getting the Budget *Real Life Lessons Learned
LIVE WEBINAR Tuesday, August 16, 2011 @ 11am PT l 2pm ET
REGISTER NOW: http://offers.tritech.com/2011_8_16-Webinar.html
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com
This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems 9860 Mesa Rim Road - San Diego, CA 92121
